00063   template <typename TSpace>
00064   class NGon2D:  public StarShaped2D<TSpace>
00065   {
00066     // ----------------------- Standard services ------------------------------
00067   public:
00068

00070     typedef typename Space::Point Point;
00071     typedef typename Space::RealPoint RealPoint2D;
00072     typedef typename Space::RealVector RealVector2D;

00110     
00111   // ------------- Implementation of 'StarShaped' services ------------------
00112   public:
00113 
00118     Point getLowerBound() const
00119     {
00120       return Point(myCenter[0] - myRadius, myCenter[1] - myRadius);
00121     }
00122 
00127     Point getUpperBound() const
00128     {
00129       return Point(myCenter[0] + myRadius, myCenter[1] + myRadius);
00130     }
00131 
00135     RealPoint2D center() const
00136     {
00137       return myCenter;
00138     }
00139    
00146     double parameter( const RealPoint2D & p ) const;
